dcterms:description: A multimodal corpus that consists of natural and induced data showing emotion in a range of contexts.
dcterms:title: HUMAINE Database

dcterms:creator: G. McKeown
M. Valstar
R. Cowie
M. Pantic
M. Schroder
dcterms:description: An emotion-rich conversational database, which was carefully constructed by recording interactions between Sensitive Artificial Listener (SAL) and users; each recording was transcribed and annotated with the actor’s emotions.
dcterms:title: SEMAINE Database

dcterms:creator: G. Kikui
S. Yamamoto
T. Takezawa
E. Sumita
dcterms:description: A corpus that has served as the primary source for developing broad-coverage speech translation systems, with sentences collected by bilingual travel experts from Japanese/English sentence pairs in travel domain phrasebooks.
dcterms:title: ATR Basic Travel Expression Corpus (BTEC)

dcterms:creator: R. Lyu
M. Liang
Y. Chiang
dcterms:description: A multilingual corpus for Taiwanese-Hakka-Mandarin, created by recording 49 hours of speech.
dcterms:title: Formosa Speech Database

dcterms:creator: D. Elliott
S. Frank
K. Sima’an
L. Specia
dcterms:description: A dataset created for a WMT Shared Task of Multimodal Machine Translation, based on multilingual English-German image descriptions.
dcterms:title: Multi30K Database

dcterms:creator: B. Plummer
L. Wang
C. Cervantes
J. Caicedo
J. Hockenmaier
S. Lazebnik
dcterms:description: A dataset that collects region-to-phrase correspondences for richer image-to-sentence models.
dcterms:title: Flickr30K Entities

dcterms:creator: L. Nio
S. Sakti
G. Neubig
T. Toda
S. Nakamura
dcterms:description: A corpus constructed to provide transcriptions of natural conversations of humans from television and movie scripts.
dcterms:title: Conversation Dialog Corpus from Movies and Television

dcterms:creator: R. Yasuhara
M. Inoue
I. Suga
T. Kosaka
dcterms:description: A large-scale multimodal dialog corpus consisting of movie files and annotations that indicate the timing of dialog segments.
dcterms:title: Large-Scale Multimodal Movie Dialogue Corpus
